com.zebra.sdk.common.card.printer

Interface ZebraCardPrinter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceUtil, JobControlProvider, JobUtil, com.zebra.sdk.settings.SettingsProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ZebraPrinterZmotif, ZebraPrinterZxp

    public interface ZebraCardPrinter
extends DeviceUtil, com.zebra.sdk.settings.SettingsProvider, JobUtil, JobControlProvider
    Base interface used to obtain various properties of a Zebra card printer.
